name: AnswerConnect
description: AnswerConnect allows you to access and update your AnswerConnect live reception account on your Android device. AnswerConnect gives you a 24/7 customer service team of experienced, friendly receptionists for your business.  Get AnswerConnects live-answering service dashboard in your pocket and never miss a customers message. Harness the best of AnswerConnect and ensure that you stay updated on all the customer messages we take on behalf of your business. With AnswerConnect Android app you can:  -- View inbound messages taken by our customer service team -- Access contact information of your customers -- Receive notifications for both customer messages and team chats alike -- Forward customer messages to your team via email/SMS -- Add notes to a customer message for your team to view -- Report a problem or an issue to the admin. -- Switch to Chats to collaborate with Team on client messages -- Archive messages for future use  Note: It is essential to have a live AnswerConnect account to access the Android app
